title: Deals: iPhone 13 MagSafe cases from $37, mophie 25% off sale, official Apple Watch chargers, more
content:
All of Tuesday’s best deals are headlined by a collection of Apple’s official iPhone 13/Pro/Max/mini cases from $37. That’s on top of a new 25% off mophie Valentine’s Day sale and the first discount on the official Apple Watch USB-C Fast Charger. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Deals: iPhone 13 MagSafe cases from $37, mophie 25% off sale, official Apple Watch chargers, more appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: The annual mophie Valentine’s Day sale has gone live with 25% off MagSafe gear and more alongside official iPhone 13 series cases.
